job_title: Sr. Business Analyst with Aladdin Data Cloud
jd: From: Deepika Dua, Stellar Consulting Solutions LLC deepika.dua@stellarconsulting.com Reply to: deepika.dua@stellarconsulting.com HiMy name is Deepika & I am a recruiter at Stellar Consulting, and I came across your profile while looking for qualified candidates for a Sr. Business Analyst with Aladdin Data Cloud role. I was impressed by your experience and skills . I think you would be a great fit for this role, as you have almost all the skills & experience required for the role. Below are the job details for your reference.Job Title : Sr. Business Analyst with Aladdin Data CloudLocation : RemoteDuration : Long term Job Summary:ResponsibilitiesSuccessful candidates must demonstrate both business function and system knowledge to lead on workstreams and tasks.Developed written skills to be able to successfully capture and replay ideas to a range of business stakeholders, including Senior Management.Requirements gathering, solution design, testWork on documenting and working core Aladdin Data IntegrationsData Integration from Aladdin into downstream systems / platformsMust have Skills:Must have worked on Alauddin Data Cloud.Great documentation skills.Requirements elicitation & collaboration skills.SQLIn depth knowledge and understanding of asset management data.
